body: I'm not really a fan of Dragon Ball now that I'm an adult as I think it's childish and has the worst writing I've seen in all anime and manga but I love this doujin. Yamcha and Maron ( along with Muten Roshi , Piccolo and Mirai Trunks ) are some of the few db characters I actually like as an adult lol. Also Ultimate Vegetto!!! Seems you forgot that filler episode around the time of the Cell games arc where Yamcha and Krillin were training and Yamcha not only beat Krillin but fucking humilated him lmao.
Her loyalty lasted all of 20 minutes.
Man i want her so bad.
After fuck with Marron... Shit, Maron, Yamcha was kill by Krillin :)
I knew something was off about her.
